isis.stitle: TSI 98-16-01 - Retrofitting a Current Production International I6 Mechanical Engine Service Cab/Glider to Support a Non-Production Three Module Engine Control System

subjectgroup.subject: Retrofitting a Current Production International I6 Mechanical Engine Service Cab/Glider to Support a Non-Production Three Module Engine Control System

geninfo.para: This TSI applies to 2/4/8000 models with International I6 or V8 HEUI engines built before November 3, 1997.

With the release of the Navistar Engine Control Module (Diamond Logic™), the three module engine control system service cab/glider is no longer available as a production option after November 3, 1997. The I6 International mechanical engine service cab/glider must be retrofitted to serve as a replacement cab for the three module engine control system service cab/glider.
A Parts Information Letter (PIL 98-16-02) has been published listing the part numbers required and instructions to accomplish the retrofit.
